text: 6:16 Ofa Gami 26:12; Esekiel 37:27; 1 Korin 3:16; 6:19Manmaghsu, e Godɨn Dɨpenim ko marvir guabar dɨpeniba isafuragham? God fomɨra kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ me ko ikɨ, egh men tongɨn daruam. Eghtɨ me nan gumazamizibar mɨn ikɨtɨ, kɨ men Godɨn ikiam.” Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia fo, e uari Godɨn zurara itimɨn dabirabir Dɨpenim.
